conversation_flow.message: Yes. Probably. We need to machine with higher true outputs.

conversation_flow.speaker: agent
conversation_flow.message: Gotcha. Gotcha. That makes total sense, especially if you're scaling up or trying to hit tighter deadlines. Do you also work with materials beyond wood, or is it mainly wood for your production?

conversation_flow.speaker: customer
conversation_flow.message: We also work with Stone.

conversation_flow.speaker: agent
conversation_flow.message: Sure. Friday at 4 PM. Got it. Uh, give me a second to sort that for you. Hang tight.

conversation_flow.speaker: customer
conversation_flow.message: Okay.

conversation_flow.speaker: agent
conversation_flow.message: Just checking availability for that time. 1 moment.

conversation_flow.speaker: customer
conversation_flow.message: Everything alright?

conversation_flow.speaker: agent

conversation_flow.message: Uh, it's stanz at Google dot com.

conversation_flow.speaker: agent
conversation_flow.message: Thanks for that. Just to confirm, that's stans at Google dot com. Right?

conversation_flow.speaker: customer
conversation_flow.message: Yep.

conversation_flow.speaker: agent
conversation_flow.message: Perfect. In Friday at 4 PM, MYT now. Give me a moment. To get that booked.
